entry.title: Full of your love
entry.summary:
Author: ColdHeartedBitch

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,061Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 78

Summary: It's Stiles who brings it up. It's been three years since they got together, two years since Stiles’ turned eighteen and they've moved together in the newly rebuilt Hale house, six months since Derek proposed. Three beautiful years. Their pack is strong, comfortable. Derek grew into his Alpha status and with time became less harsh, less angry at the world.With the Beacon Hills being so peaceful for some time already, them happy and comfortable, Stiles started to think about their family. About bringing cubs into their life. Yes, he is young, he still has college to finish. But he's sure he wants kids with Derek. And he knows that he has nothing to be afraid of. He will have help, he won't be alone. Derek, his dad and Melissa, their pack.

entry.title: The Fox and the Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Nathysama

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,894Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 40

Summary: In the coveted lands of Beacon Hills, a prized territory within Caeloria, magic is power—and its absence invites scorn. Stiles Stilinski, heir to an ancient house, bears the burden of being an inert: born without Arkanis, the magic that rules the realm. Ignored by his family and underestimated by enemies, he’s determined to protect the Stilinski legacy—even without the power others deem essential.With his grandfather leading amidst tense gatherings and his father missing under mysterious circumstances, Stiles is isolated and vulnerable. But the reclusive Hale family—feared for their near-feral strength—emerges as a potential ally. Together, wolves and foxes must face threats in the forests and the halls of nobility.Conspiracies and ancient magic place Beacon Hills at the center of a storm. Stiles must prove that even without Arkanis, a fox’s cunning can outmatch a kingdom of wolves.

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,529Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 47

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: Casus Belli
entry.summary:
Author: Dexterous_Sinistrous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,303Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 53

Summary: “I’m supposed to take care of you,” Derek started.“Shut up,” Stiles stated with no heat. He looked up at Derek. “When are you going to get it that I like taking care of you too?”Derek weakly shook his head. “I’m not good enough, Stiles.”Stiles’ features sunk. “Don’t I get to decide that?” He stood, dropping the towel he had been using to help move the blanket. “Just… get in bed, Derek. We can talk later.”Derek remembered touching Stiles’ wrist. “I should have died that night we met.”“Not when I have anything to do with it,” Stiles replied.~*~The one where "touch him and die" is a promise both Derek and Stiles live by

entry.title: Moonlight Sonata
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,536Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: The cold of the night keeps its secrets, guarding eyes that have never aged, hands that have caressed the impossible.Stiles drifts through cities and shadows, carrying the weight of centuries, solitude etched into his bones, pacts whispered to forces no one dares name.When the Hale pack confronts enemies that twist the very laws they know, his power stirs — offering sanctuary and danger in equal, haunting measure.Amid fractured promises, spilled blood, and the hum of ancient magic, something rises — too fierce to be safe, too wild to be tamed, something that bends rules, time, and the fragile thread of sanity itself.On the razor’s edge between survival and oblivion, they will learn that some forces cannot be commanded… and some desires cannot, will not, be denied.

entry.title: LIKE THE COMING OF SPRING
entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,994Chapters: 30/36Kudos: 3

Summary: Three months after leaving to attend Berkeley, Stiles receives a phone call. Twelve years later; Stiles and Derek's son, Eli, is eager to help when a new enemy emerges. The nemeton has been quieted, but things never remain silent forever. When a demonic force threatens the peace in Beacon Hills, the Hale pack must prove that they are stronger than ever.Or;You are in the backyard, lying in the grass. The sun is high and hot. The light is painting the darkness behind your eyes into a vermillion. “You know what you have to do, right?” Laura asks. Last you saw she was filling a wading pool, but the water has stopped running through the hose and as she moves you can hear it sloshing around her shins.“No clue,” you answer. Laura laughs. You've missed that sound so much, and it makes you think about how long it took you after your family died to laugh again. “Last time we spoke you said my grief was too quiet… but it's been a while since I lost anyone.”You hear the water slosh two more times as she steps out of the pool. She walks over to you and stands so close to your arm that you can feel how cold the water is from her feet.“Who says grief must be fresh to be felt?”

entry.title: if couches could talk
entry.summary:
Author: seaweedwater

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 82,978Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 145

Summary: Derek watched Stiles grow into the young man he is now—smart, funny, kind, exceptional, truly gorgeous. He could easily find someone his age who would give him the time of day, but he doesn’t seem interested in a relationship, or anything that could distract him from pining for Derek’s notice.Derek would be lying if he said he didn’t like the attention. He’s careful with it, careful not to indulge him and lead him on, to take advantage, because there’s nothing that could ever happen between them. He’s a child, his son’s best friend, the son of a Sheriff who has a gun rack, and Derek is thirty-six and unhappily married with taxes to pay and a house to maintain.It’s just a fantasy, something Derek lets his mind play with since he knows nothing could ever come of it. If he imagines Stiles’ fingers inside him instead of his own, it’s not like anyone else could ever know that.

entry.title: To Survive a Serial Killer
entry.summary:
Author: DarkScarlette

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 66,427Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 30

Summary: Stiles never planned to stay in Beacon Hills, but something about Derek’s empty loft made it impossible to leave. Now working as a consultant for the Sheriff’s department, he’s drawn into a chilling case. The investigation takes a personal turn when Derek suddenly returns, bloody and broken, with wounds that match the killer’s victims.With Derek back, and no clear idea what they’re up against, the pack is forced to regroup. As Stiles, Scott, Lydia, and the others race to unravel the mystery, old emotions resurface, secrets unravel, and survival becomes anything but guaranteed.Whatever this killer is, it’s not human—and it’s just getting started.
